title: DNS Resolution Failed
expected: DNS should resolve test.azurecr.io to IP addresses
actual: DNS lookup failed with exit code 1
details:
DNS lookup error: Server:		127.0.0.53
Address:	127.0.0.53#53

** server can't find test.azurecr.io: NXDOMAIN
next_steps: Check network connectivity and DNS settings. Verify ACR name `test` is correct and registry exists in resource group `test-rg`

title: HTTPS Connectivity Failed
expected: HTTPS connection should succeed to test.azurecr.io
actual: HTTPS connection failed with exit code 6
next_steps: Check network connectivity, firewall rules (port 443), and proxy settings. Verify ACR `test` service status in resource group `test-rg`

title: TLS Certificate Validation Failed
expected: TLS certificate should be valid and trusted
details: Unable to validate TLS certificate for test.azurecr.io
next_steps: Check if ACR `test` is accessible and certificate is properly configured in resource group `test-rg`

title: Docker Registry API Unreachable
expected: Docker Registry API should be accessible
actual: API test failed with exit code 6
details: Unable to reach Docker Registry v2 API endpoint
next_steps: Check ACR `test` service health and network connectivity to the registry API in resource group `test-rg`
